name: .:Mitra:.
description:
Ellie and Jaji are childhood friends with an affinity for the occult. However, their plan to gather enough members to start up an occult club at their high school goes a bit off course, and now the three of you have some demons to contend with...or befriend. Will you be able to convince them to stick around, or will things with your new infernal allies go south?

Mitra is a story following a reckless occult club and it’s… unlikely new members as they go about a totally normal school day. Completely normal, I say; nothing to see here.

FEATURES:

  • Dozens of unique, hand-drawn pieces of art
  • Multiple story choices and two endings (a.k.a. you should play it more than once)
  • A head-first dive into the occult
  • Four (4) demons
  • No wait, two (2) demons and two (2) yaksha (Google it, human!)
  • The three humans that started this mess
  • ...A duck?

NOTES & WARNINGS:

Content warning for cartoon violence, bullying, profanity, smoking, and mentions of tobacco.

Mitra is a visual novel created in a month for the Spooktober 3rd Annual Visual Novel Jam! This novel will provide the player with choices that will lead them to different endings, as well as down different routes that will follow the escapades of several demons and yaksha. Each choice will allow you to follow a member of the occult club as they go about a “normal” day at school.

This story is a light horror/comedy story that follows our wonderful occult club, which doesn’t get much scarier than pissing off a yaksha, however bad that may get.

A Note To Streamers: If you would like to stream this game, you are more than welcome to! Please send us a link if you are so inclined, we’d love your opinions. However, please heed the content warnings, as this is geared towards older teens and adults. There is a fair amount of cursing and definitely some mentions of the occult.
